title: Operation history
content:
Operation history enables you to view the history of the following operations.

  • Create tenant
  • Deploy tenant
  • Delete tenant
  • Import tenant
  • Export tenant
  • Update tenant
  • Deploy capability
  • The failed jobs to sync updated managed tenants or managed accounts from Suite Administration to Service Management.

You can filter the records by job ID or operation type.

NoteÂ The system will clean the operation history after 7 days.
